sentences.sContent: You have not spoken to the owner before. the 1st launderette was purchased 10 years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have not spoken to the owner before. the 1st launderette was purchased 10 years ago.
sentences.sCn: 你还没有以前和所有者谈话。10年以前第1自助洗衣店被购买。

sentences.sContent: Shop, library, launderette , computer suite, sports hall.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shop, library, launderette , computer suite, sports hall.
sentences.sCn: 商店，图书馆，自动洗衣店，电脑房，运动馆。

words.tran: 洗衣店，洗衣房；要洗的衣服；洗熨；洗好的衣服

trans.tranOther: a place where you can go to wash your clothes in machines that work when you put coins in them
